#summary Interfaces implementadas pelo projeto

=Resumo das interfaces=

As seguintes interfaces são definidas no diretório rpo/

{{{
interface rpo\util\Set extends \rpo\util\Collection {
}

interface rpo\util\Lists extends \rpo\util\Collection, \ArrayAccess {	
	public function indexOf( BaseObject $object );	
	public function slice( $offset , $length = null );
}

interface Collection rpo\util\extends \rpo\base\BaseObject, \Countable, \IteratorAggregate {	
	public function add( BaseObject $object );	
	public function addAll( Collection $collection );	
	public function clear();	
	public function contains( BaseObject $object );	
	public function containsAll( Collection $collection );	
	public function exchangeArray( array $items );	
	public function getIteratorClass();	
	public function isEmpty();	
	public function remove( BaseObject $object );	
	public function removeAll( Collection $collection );	
	public function retainAll( Collection $collection );	
	public function setIteratorClass( $class );	
	public function toArray();	
	public function update();
}

interface rpo\mvc\View extends \rpo\base\BaseObject {	
	public function configure( HTTPResponse $panel );	
	public function show();
}

interface rpo\mvc\Controller extends \rpo\base\BaseObject {	
	public function canHandle( HTTPRequest $request );	
	public function getResponse();	
	public function handle( HTTPRequest $request );
}

interface rpo\http\HTTPRequestMethod {
	const DELETE = 'DELETE';
	const GET = 'GET';
	const POST = 'POST';
	const PUT = 'PUT';
}

interface rpo\http\HTTPIO extends \rpo\base\BaseObject {	
	public function getBody();	
	public function getHeaders();
}

interface rpo\http\header\HTTPPriorityHeaderField extends \rpo\http\header\HTTPHeaderField, \Iterator {	
	public function getPriority();
}

interface rpo\http\header\HTTPHeaderField extends \rpo\base\BaseObject {	
	public function __toString();	
	public function getName();	
	public function getStatusCode();	
	public function getValue();	
	public function setValue( $value );
}

interface rpo\gui\widget\panel\Panel extends \rpo\base\BaseObject, \Countable {	
	public function clear();
}

interface rpo\base\BaseObject {	
	public function getClass();	
	public function equals( BaseObject $object );	
	public function hashCode();
}
}}}
